text:
Today we are learning with Netflix’s 
hilarious coming-of-age comedy, Sex Education.

Now it is probably obvious from the name of 
this series, but in this lesson we are going

to be covering a lot of mature topics, such as 
vocabulary and slang related to sexual relations.

This is valuable because it is a topic that 
many people talk about with their friends,

and that you could encounter if you travel 
or live in an English speaking country

or even just watching other series or movies.
However, if it is not something that you want

to learn about, then why not watch another one of 
our more family-friendly lessons in this playlist?

Hey, just a second! If you are new here, 
every week we help you to understand your

favorite series movies, music and more without 
getting lost, without missing the jokes and

without subtitles. In fact, Sasi says that our 
lessons have them addicted to studying English.

Wow! So let's help you to take 
your English to the next level too.

Just hit that subscribe button and the button 
below so that you don't miss a single new lesson.

Isn't it just so frustrating when we natives 
speak fast, we link our words together and you

can't understand us? Well, you are not alone. 
So many learners have told us that this is one

of the biggest things that makes them lose their 
confidence when communicating in English. And that

is exactly why we made our Fluent with Friends 
Course, so that you can have fun developing the

skills that you need to confidently understand 
natives whether it is while watching your favorite

TV series, like Sex Education or listening to 
a podcast or even at work or when traveling.

I've seen how transformative this 
course can be for learners like you.

So I want you to try it right now for 
FREE with our three-part masterclass.

All you have to do to get started is 
click up here or in the description

below. I am so excited to help you to take 
the next step on your English Fluency journey.

Hey! Have you enjoyed learning with Sex 
Education? Then maybe you want to continue

your education by learning with Joey Tribiani's 
sex tips. Let's watch a clip from that lesson.
